home.welcome: Welcome to the Smart Wardrobe Analytics
home.aboutDescription: Smart Wardrobe Analytics is an innovative application designed to help users manage their wardrobe efficiently and make better fashion choices. With our app, you can keep track of your clothing items, monitor usage statistics, and get insights into your wardrobe's performance.
home.feature1: Track your clothing items and manage your wardrobe.
home.feature2: Monitor usage statistics for each item.
home.feature3: Get insights into seasonal item usage.
home.feature4: View top combinations of clothing items.
home.businessDescription: Business users have access to advanced statistics and features, including brand management and bonus systems. Make informed decisions and optimize your inventory with Smart Wardrobe Analytics.
home.securityDescription: We take your privacy seriously. Your data is securely stored and only accessible by you. We are committed to protecting your information and ensuring your privacy.

register.agreeToDataProcessing: I agree to the processing of my data
